questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    printf("%d", x++);
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int a = 10;
    int b = 20;
    int c;
    c = a++ + b;
    printf("%d", c);
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int i = 0;
    while (i < 5) {
        printf("%d ", i);
        i++;
    }
    printf("%d", i);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

int main() {
    int a = 2;
    if (a >> 1)
        printf("%d\n", a);
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    x = x << 2;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main() {
    int x = 4, y, z;
    y = --x;
    z = x--;
    printf("%d%d%d", x, y, z);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main() {
    int x = 4;
    int *p = &x;
    int *k = p++;
    int r = p - k;
    printf("%d", r);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main() {
    int a = 5, b = -7, c = 0, d;
    d = ++a && ++b || ++c;
    printf("\n%d%d%d%d", a, b, c, d);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main() {
    int b = 6;
    int c = 7;
    int a = ++b + c--;
    printf("%d", a);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main() {
    double b = 8;
    b++;
    printf("%lf", b);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main() {
    int k = 0;
    double b = k++ + ++k + k--;
    printf("%d", k);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

void main() {
    int h = 8;
    int b = h++ + h++ + h++;
    printf("%d\n", h);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

int main() {
    int a = -1, b = 4, c = 1, d;
    d = ++a && ++b || ++c;
    printf("%d, %d, %d, %d\n", a, b, c, d);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int i;
    for (i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
        if (i % 2 == 0)
            continue;
        printf("%d ", i);
    }
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

double k = 0;
for (k = 0.0; k < 3.0; k++);
printf("%lf", k);
}

What will be the output of the following C code?

int i = 0;
do
{
    i++;
    if (i == 2)
        continue;
    printf("In while loop ");
} while (i < 2);
printf("%d\n", i);
}

options.b: In while loop in while loop 3

questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int i = 0;
    for (; i < 5; i++) {
        printf("%d ", i);
}
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    x = x + 2 * 3;
    printf("%d", x);
}

What is the output of the following program?

void main() {
    int x = 5;
    int *ptr = &x;
    printf("%p", ptr);
}

options.B: Address of x in hexadecimal format

questions.question:
What will be the output of the following C code?

void foo();
printf("1 ");
foo();
void foo() {
    printf("2 ");
}
